data.name: Robert Vanderbei
data.research: Telescope design for searching for extra-solar planets; high-contrast imaging; diffractive optics; robust optimization; fast Fourier optimization; financial portfolio selection; convex optimization; multi-objective optimization; stochastic dominance; stability of Saturn's rings; astrophysics; stable solutions to the n-body problem

data.name: Naveen Verma
data.research: Analog and digital integrated circuits with an emphasis on developing system platforms for emerging applications, especially where considerable computation and instrumentation is required but energy is severely constrained. Important examples include implantable and wearable biomedical systems and remote sensing and processing network nodes.
affiliations: Keller Center for Innovation in Engineering Education

data.name: Pramod Viswanath
data.research: First principle understanding and design of blockchains; inventing communication algorithms via deep learning.

data.name: David Walker
data.research: Programming language theory, design, analysis and implementation.

data.name: Mengdi Wang
data.research: Decision making and reinforcement learning problems involving uncertainty or hidden information; modeling uncertainty and designing algorithmic approaches that "learn" the best decisions as information is revealed. optimization (stochastic, online, and even more), stochastic programming, variational inequalities, dynamic programing, statistical learning, and game dynamics.

data.name: Kevin Wayne
data.research: Expertise: Algorithms, data structures, optimization, computer science education, teaching computer science at scale.

data.name: Michael A. Webb
data.research: Biomolecular engineering, cellular and tissue engineering, complex materials and processing, energy and environment, theory and simulation.

data.name: Elke U. Weber
data.research: Questions at the intersection of psychology, economics, engineering, and policy that address the importance and role of descriptive/behavioral models of judgment and decision-making under risk and uncertainty and for decisions with long time horizons in environmental and energy-related decision making and policy. Psychologically appropriate ways to measure and model individual, group, or cultural differences in risk taking and time discounting across domains.
affiliations: Andlinger Center for Energy and the Environment

data.name: Matt Weinberg
data.research: The intersection of algorithms and human incentives. Algorithmic mechanism design: including auction design, cryptocurrencies, and "social good"; algorithmic game theory; online algorithms. Algorithms and uncertainty.

data.name: David Wentzlaff
data.research: Computer architecture, operating systems, sustainable computing, data center computing, cloud computing, multicore systems, manycore systems, microprocessor design, low-lower computer design, energy efficient computing.

data.name: Claire White
data.research: Long-term behavior of low-CO2 concrete, and the mineralization processes during CO2 capture and storage. Durability of alkali-activated cements; atomic and nanoscale morphology of cementitious materials; reaction kinetics of cement formation; amorphous carbonate materials; combined modeling/experimental methodologies; Monte Carlo methods; ab-initio calculations; total scattering analysis.
affiliations: Andlinger Center for Energy and the Environment

data.name: Aimy Wissa
data.research: Control, robotics and dynamical systems. Bioinspired design and fluids.

data.name: Gerard Wysocki
data.research: Laser spectroscopy; broadly tunable laser systems; external cavity quantum cascade lasers; spectroscopic systems for remote and/or in-situ chemical sensing and spectroscopic trace-gas sensor networks

data.name: Saien Xie
data.research: Syntheses of thin film materials; electrical and optical characterizations of nanoscale devices.
affiliations: Princeton Institute for the Science and Technology of Materials

data.name: Nan Yao
data.office: Andlinger Center for Energy and the Environment 33
data.research: Utilizing advanced imaging, diffraction, spectroscopy and in-situ techniques, in tandem with theoretical simulations, to study fundamentals of the structure-composition-processing-property-performance relations in complex materials such as nanostructured materials, biomaterials, organic/inorganic interfaces, block copolymers, catalysts, quasicrystals and functional nanomaterials.
affiliations: Princeton Institute for the Science and Technology of Materials

data.name: Huacheng Yu
data.research: Data structures and streaming algorithms.

data.name: Mark Zhandry
data.research: Cryptography; Computer science theory; Program obfuscation. Analyzing the effects that quantum computers will have on cryptography. Developing new cryptographic capabilities and improving the efficiency of these applications.

data.name: Ellen Zhong
data.research: Computational biology, machine learning.

data.name: Mark Zondlo
data.research: Climate; atmospheric sciences: sensors and remote sensing; cloud formation; the role of aerosol particles in atmospheric chemistry and air quality
